name: Popular Medical Camp
briefDescription: Popular Medical Camp is a responsive and feature-rich dashboard for managing medical camps and participants
detailedDescription: Popular Medical Camp is designed to facilitate organizers and participants in managing medical camps efficiently. Organizers can add, manage, and track camps while participants can register and view their registered camps. The dashboard provides intuitive navigation and professional features for seamless management.
challenges: Implementing a responsive sidebar with a toggle functionality for mobile and tablet views
Efficiently managing data for organizers and participants while ensuring smooth navigation
Designing a user-friendly UI that suits both organizers and participants
shortcomings: Currently, the count of pagination of tables in some section does not include proper dynamic data visualizations
Limited customization options for participant profiles
plannedImprovements: Improve dynamic counts in the tables of some section to show proper counts of specific user data row for both organizers and participants
Improve the date & time input field in manage camp page and add camp page
Add role based page where organizer can easily change role of participants or manage users

name: Car Rental Application
briefDescription: A platform for renting cars with features for bookings, availability status, and price calculations
detailedDescription: This project allows users to browse cars, check their availability, book them for specific dates, and manage bookings efficiently.
challenges: Implementing real-time booking status updates across users
Calculating total price dynamically, including fees, based on the rental period
shortcomings: Limited filtering options for car types and categories
UI for managing bookings can be further optimized for better user experience
plannedImprovements: Adding advanced filters for car types, brands, and price ranges
Integrating a payment gateway for seamless online payments

name: Chill Gamer
briefDescription: The platform where logged in users can add review for their favorite games
detailedDescription: This project enables users to filter game reviews by genres to quickly find relevant content.
challenges: Ensuring the filtering logic handles multiple genres and updates the UI in real-time
Managing the state efficiently for large datasets
shortcomings: Currently supports filtering by a single genre only
Does not have a search bar to combine filters with keyword search
plannedImprovements: Integrating a search bar for more robust filtering

name: Discount Pro
briefDescription: An application to discover and use e-commerce discount coupons in Bangladesh
detailedDescription: This app helps users find coupons by brands, copy coupon codes, and browse available discounts easily.
challenges: Integrating Firebase authentication and handling edge cases like multiple failed login attempts
Implement some packages, these packages are unknown. But, when explore the packages then easily applied
shortcomings: Search functionality in Brands page and users can find their favorite brand in here
Sort options in Brands page where find the top rated brands by sort functionality
plannedImprovements: Implementing a push notification system to inform users about new deals
Adding Sort options with functionality and Search functionality

name: Dragon News
briefDescription: Dragon News is a news-related website featuring eight categories of news content
detailedDescription: Dragon News is a user-friendly website where users can easily explore news across various categories. Access to detailed views of specific news items is restricted to logged-in users.
challenges: Implemented React Fast Marquee to display category names. Clicking on a specific category name redirects users to the corresponding category page
Designed and structured the layout with two sidebars and centralized main content
shortcomings: Missing a 'Not Found' component for categories with no content. A component should be built to handle such cases
The website lacks a footer relevant to its theme and purpose
plannedImprovements: Enhance the routing system by completing content for the existing routes
Add additional features to improve user experience

name: MZ Shop
briefDescription: The platform is shopping of accessories. From smart devices to the coolest accessories are available
detailedDescription: The MZ Shop platform is the responsive website. In here, users can browse products also browse by categories. They can view details of the product and would like to add to cart or watch list.
challenges: The main challenging thing was the Navbar not be the same in different pages, just different view in the Home page
Fetch data by categories in the Home page
shortcomings: When add a product in cart side from the watch list, then add the product perfectly but do not remove from the watch list. So, main focus on it
Complete the Footer. Links improvements are the main
plannedImprovements: Improve the Dashboard page. Apply delete functionality when add product in cart from the watch list
Add Chart in the statistics page. Now, it is empty
